channel.title: CVE Feed for Xylus Themes -- WP Event Aggregator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Xylus Themes -- WP Event Aggregator

item.title: CVE-2024-38703|2024-07-22T20:40:32.841Z -- xylus%20themes -- wp%20event%20aggregator
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Xylus Themes WP Event Aggregator allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Event Aggregator: from n/a through 1.7.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-31371|2024-04-12T09:28:51.534Z -- xylus%20themes -- wp%20event%20aggregator
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Xylus Themes WP Event Aggregator.This issue affects WP Event Aggregator: from n/a through 1.7.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-38703|2024-07-20T07:32:15.077Z -- xylus%20themes -- wp%20event%20aggregator
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Xylus Themes WP Event Aggregator allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Event Aggregator: from n/a through 1.7.9.
